title: Innate Brewers - "Brave New World" (Double Dry Hopped IPA)

contentBlocks.value:
Picture this, the year is 2389, the world is in a dark and perilous state. Beers taste like water and AFL tactics have degraded into a game more closely resembling Curling. Two beer smashers travel back in time search of delicious beer recipe and a more glorious gamestyle for AFL.

Captain Beers and his sidekick space cadet journey through the local pubs of Australia drinking the kegs dry until they find the most delicious beer:

"Brave New World". 

Captain Beers :"Aww yeah this'll do 5.8% and bit of El dorado hops"
Space Cadet: "We still need to find a way to fix football"
Malcom Blight: "Hold my Beer"
